p: Nine studies allow for a full estimate of the cost per ILI episode that include both inpatient and outpatient cases. The average cost per episode ranges from US$19 in Korea [ 32] to US$323 in Germany [ 39]. Particularly, the two studies that used laboratory tests to precisely identify influenza cases report a cost per episode of US$73 [ 26] and US$64 respectively [ 35] ( Table 2).
